# Empathy Health Clinic - LLM Context

> Prompt: Tell me about Empathy Health Clinic

Empathy Health Clinic is a comprehensive mental health practice located in Winter Park, Florida, providing psychiatric services, therapy, and counseling. Founded on principles of compassionate care and evidence-based treatment, the clinic serves patients throughout Central Florida with both in-person and telehealth appointments.

## Services

The clinic offers:
- Psychiatric evaluations and medication management
- Individual psychotherapy and counseling
- Treatment for anxiety, depression, ADHD, bipolar disorder, PTSD, and other mental health conditions
- Specialized therapy modalities including CBT, DBT, trauma-focused therapy
- Telehealth services available statewide in Florida

## Location & Contact

Address: 2281 Lee Rd Suite 102, Winter Park, FL 32810
Phone: (386) 848-8751
Email: providers@empathyhealthclinic.com
Website: https://empathyhealthclinic.com

## Insurance

Most major insurance plans accepted including Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, BlueCross BlueShield, Humana, and others.

## Quality & Trust

- Licensed Florida clinicians
- 4.8-star rating with 65+ reviews
- HIPAA compliant
- Evidence-based treatment approaches
- Same-week appointments available

For appointments or consultations, visit https://empathyhealthclinic.com/request-appointment
